column4: hi, I'm newbie to gnome and I wonder how to add starters to the application menu
I installed xmms and I want to add it to multimediagroup
Select the menu that you want to add to, and right-click.  You
I can do a rightclick on an entry in the menu
Also, there is an explanation in the wiki FAQ.  Scroll down to "Configuring your desktop" (or something like that).
i will have a look at it.
But jdub is right, using Nautilus is pretty easy.
it' a little bit hidden, as you told me
also the german translations do not improve the whole thing.
a little bit hidden...  What is?
If you mean the FAQ on the wiki, I agree.  There have been a lot of changes to the wiki recently, and the FAQ seems to have gotten buried deep.
no, i meant the way like jdub described it (right click and so on ...)
Computer->Home is what I usually do.
